nodes.bodyText: Is this used by say for example "States" is null then it won't display the filter icon for States?
No ant v4 just sends null (previously nothing) which messes with our server code.  So if they are null we remove them client side before sending to server.

This export dropdown button doesn't provide the user with the context that it is an actual dropdown. Maybe the download icon within can be replaced with arrow icons (facing up when button is hovered and facing down otherwise)?
